name: Lapis Vitae (Point&Click Adventure)
description:
Point and Click through a dungeon, "help" NPCs, so you can "borrow" their stuff.

The game was made by Erik, John and Sepp for the 49th ludum dare game jam.

Controls:
Left Mouse: Move, Interact, Talk, Pick, Advance Dialogue
WASD/ArrowKeys: Move
Right Mouse: Inspect, Deselect Item
ESC: Skip Dialogue
